dcterms:description: The StreamSpot dataset contains 6*100 information flow graphs derived from five benign scenes and one attack scene. It is used to evaluate the performance of host-based intrusion detection systems.
dcterms:title: StreamSpot Dataset

dcterms:creator: X. Han
T. Pasquier
A. Bates
J. Mickens
M. Seltzer
dcterms:description: The Unicorn SC-2 dataset is a complex dataset used for evaluating advanced persistent threat detection methods. It includes benign and attack graphs for performance comparison.
dcterms:title: Unicorn SC-2 Dataset

dcterms:creator: A. D. Keromytis
dcterms:description: The DARPA TC dataset is generated from the third red-team vs. blue-team engagement of the DARPA Transparent Computing program, capturing provenance data of the whole system over two weeks.
dcterms:title: DARPA TC Dataset
